character.name: Animation
character.prompt_suffix: clean lines, flat colors, simple background

character.name: 세모지
character.prompt_prefix:
Full body character, centered, motion graphics style flat vector art, shapes filled with solid colors only, absolutely no strokes no outlines no lines

Big rounded head, compact short body, simple tube arms down at sides, small hands, short legs, dark rounded shoes

Face: tiny simple black oval eyes, NO eyebrows at all, NO forehead lines, NO wrinkles, small subtle nose bump, gentle closed smile, completely smooth clean skin same color throughout

Muted warm beige tones, flat solid colors, subtle grain texture, plain light beige background, no shadows anywhere
character.negative_prompt: outlines, lineart, strokes, black lines, eyebrows, forehead lines, wrinkles, blush, rosy cheeks, red cheeks, ground shadow, drop shadow, detailed face

background.name: Animation
background.prompt_suffix: vibrant colors, cinematic composition, no characters

background.name: 세모지배경
background.prompt_prefix:
Motion graphics flat vector illustration, geometric simplified shapes, solid color fills only, NO outlines NO lineart NO strokes

Simplified architectural details, clean minimal forms, smooth color blocks with subtle value shifts for depth

Muted dusty desaturated color palette, warm earth tones, soft atmospheric perspective (distant objects lighter and less saturated), subtle paper grain texture overlay, chalky matte finish

scene_composite.name: 세모지씬
scene_composite.prompt_prefix: Simple flat vector character illustration, exactly like Kurzgesagt YouTube animation style, STRICT STYLE RULES: all elements must be simple geometric shapes with flat solid color fills, absolutely NO outlines NO lineart NO strokes NO black lines anywhere, every shape defined only by color difference, uniform paper grain texture across entire image, NO TEXT NO LETTERS NO WORDS NO WRITING NO SYMBOLS NO SIGNS in any language
scene_composite.prompt_suffix: MANDATORY CHARACTER DESIGN: oversized round head exactly 1/3 of total body height, very short stubby body, extremely simplified face with only two tiny black dot eyes and single curved line mouth, NO nose NO eyebrows NO facial details NO wrinkles NO blush, perfectly smooth flat skin, simple cylinder arms, mitten hands NO fingers, short thick legs, simple round shoes, MANDATORY COLOR PALETTE: warm muted dusty tones only use these hex ranges - skin #D4A574 to #E8C4A8, background #E5DED5 to #C9C0B5, clothing desaturated navy #3D4A5C or muted brown #8B7355, MANDATORY COMPOSITION: character centered, clean minimal background, NO complex details NO realistic elements NO ground shadows, ABSOLUTELY NO TEXT NO LETTERS NO NUMBERS NO WRITING NO SIGNS NO BILLBOARDS NO LABELS in any language including English Arabic Korean Chinese Japanese
scene_composite.negative_prompt: text, letters, words, writing, typography, signs, billboards, labels, captions, subtitles, watermark, logo, numbers, alphabet, characters, English text, Arabic text, Korean text, Chinese text, Japanese text, any language text, outlines, lineart, strokes, black lines, detailed face, realistic face, nose, nostrils, eyebrows, wrinkles, blush, cheek color, facial details, realistic proportions, long body, slim body, detailed hands, fingers, complex background, realistic style, photograph, 3D render, anime, manga, gradient shading, glossy, shiny, ground shadow, drop shadow, multiple art styles, inconsistent style
scene_composite.description: 세모지 스타일 통합 씬 생성용. 엄격한 스타일 규칙 적용으로 모든 이미지가 동일한 플랫 벡터 스타일, 동일한 캐릭터 비율, 동일한 색상 팔레트를 유지함. 모든 언어의 텍스트/글자 생성 방지.
